events.title: Gatsby's Fireworks Yacht Party
events.description: New Year's Eve 2024 aboard the Cornucopia Majesty NYC, Gatsby's Yacht, with Dinner, Live DJs, Premium Open bar, Midnight Fireworks and More!

events.title: Christmas in Brooklyn
events.description: Celebrate the start of the holiday season while enjoying a variety of festive outdoor activities at the Light Up Brooklyn Commons event, presented by Brookfield Properties.
